topics.body:
"@ArcticEight":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5535c0ad6368727f388e0100#post_5535c0ad6368727f388e0100
<Not into cub, but I do like furry stuff once in a while.  I used to go to conventions and meetups but the furry fandom in the early 2000's was a fucking nightmare drama wise.  I don't fursuit anymore cause making a decent one is fucking expensive; a crappy one costs like $500, a decent one costs thousands of dollars, a good one costs tens of thousands of dollars so fuck that.

Type of furry stuff I like:
[spoiler]!http://th05.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/i/2013/262/a/4/don_t_feed_rengar_by_exaxuxer-d6myhj7.jpg![/spoiler]
